name: Fogbound
description: Smugglers and enforcers cloaked in mist, they rule Gravesport’s black markets through fear and shadow.

name: Ember Assembly
description: Scholars of flame and ruin who believe power must be harnessed from destruction itself.

name: Hollow Order
description: An ancient cult that worships stillness, silence, and death — rumored to reanimate truth as bone.
